name: Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dragon Age Origins/DAOriginsLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Game...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: windowmanagermanaged=n
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    args: /quiet /qn
    blocking: true
    description: Installing PhysX...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/redist/PhysX_9.09.0408_SystemSoftware.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_monitoring: true
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  StrictDrawOrdering: enabled
